summary: This document is an email chain regarding a victim's travel arrangements and emotional state in preparation for attending a hearing in the case of United States v. Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence discusses providing support, including potential hotel or car service, and mentions Safe Horizon counselors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, for which a hearing is scheduled.

events.title: Hearing in United States v. Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A court hearing scheduled in the criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A victim is emotionally struggling and planning to attend the August 27, 2019 hearing in the Epstein case.
The correspondence involves arranging travel and logistical support (hotel, car service) for the victim to attend the hearing.
Safe Horizon, a victim services organization, has been contacted to provide counseling support.
